name: Half-Orc
description: Half-orcs are a mix of human and orc heritage, combining the ambition of humans with the ferocity of orcs.

special_abilities.name: Orc Blood
special_abilities.description: For all effects related to race, a half-orc is considered an orc.

special_abilities.name: Intelligence Floor
special_abilities.description: A half-orc’s starting Intelligence score is always at least 3. If this adjustment would lower the character’s score to 1 or 2, his score is nevertheless 3.
